name: Custom firefox tabs close button
description:
I like this old-fashnioned close buttons...
This style changes the appearance of the close buttons in Firefox tabs.
additional_info:
19-07-08 Updated: now change the close-button-tabs too.
03-09-15 Updated: now works in Firefox 40

discussions.name: I plan on reverse-engineering this someday :)
Nice. I've tweaked it to avoid conflicts with a slim tab bar, and for showing on hover
